summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6716 for the improvement of Lawton Wood Sanitary Sewer System constructed in easement acquired in Government Lot 4, Section 10, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W.M., generally located in area north of Discovery Park, between 47th Avenue West and Bay Terrace Addition, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof upon the property within the district; establishing a local improvement fund, and amending Ordinance 109568 to revise the description of the improvement area to conform to the improvement, as built, and to revise the maximum interest payable on local improvement bonds.
